display_name: Apnea-Hypopnea Index (REM): (Apneas with >= 3% oxygen desaturation threshold used and with or without arousal+ hypopneas with > 50% flow reduction and with >= 3% oxygen desaturation used and with or without arousal) / hours of REM sleep from type I polysomnography
description: [(total number of apneas and hypopneas in rapid eye movement sleep (REM) associated with >= 3% desaturation) / (hours of rapid eye movement sleep (REM))]
calculation: 60*(hrembp3 + hrop3 + carbp3 + carop3 + oarbp3 + oarop3 + marbp3 + marop3) / minremp
